name: Abizaid Fateen
description: I’m ready to explore the next chapter in my life and hopefully find someone to finish each other’s book.. . My ultimate goal is to find the perfect for me” someone to share what lies ahead. I’m considered by others to be smart, ambitious, generous, charitable, modestly confident, charming, polished, and very funny. My close friends would say, if I were a brand, I would represent honesty, integrity, and commitment. If I were asked what I perceived to be my strengths, they would include, being a great communicator two ears, one mouth, a great planner, yet spontaneous. I am both a hard and smart worker, I have accomplished every childhood goal . I have a deep appreciation of “being in love. yet I am modern in my beliefs of individualism, shared roles and equality in a relationship.
